app.title: Tend
app.subtitle: Stretching & Flexibility
app.description: A gentle stretching and flexibility app designed for all ages and abilities

folderDescriptions.lowerBack: Lower back relief and strengthening routines
folderDescriptions.neck: Neck mobility and tension relief routines
folderDescriptions.upperBody: Upper body mobility and strength routines
folderDescriptions.lowerBody: Lower body mobility and strength routines
folderDescriptions.seated: Seated exercises for office or limited mobility

neckRolls.name: Neck Rolls
neckRolls.description: Slowly roll your head in a circle, first clockwise, then counterclockwise. Keep movements gentle and controlled.
neckRolls.instructions: Start with small circles and gradually increase the range of motion.

shoulderShrugs.name: Shoulder Shrugs
shoulderShrugs.description: Lift your shoulders up toward your ears, hold for 3 seconds, then relax. Repeat slowly.
shoulderShrugs.instructions: Keep the movements controlled and avoid quick shrugging motions.

sideNeckStretch.name: Side Neck Stretch
sideNeckStretch.description: Gently tilt your head to the right, hold for 15 seconds, then repeat on the left side.
sideNeckStretch.instructions: Keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid pulling with your hand.

forwardNeckStretch.name: Forward Neck Stretch
forwardNeckStretch.description: Slowly lower your chin toward your chest, feeling a gentle stretch in the back of your neck.
forwardNeckStretch.instructions: Hold the stretch gently and avoid excessive tension.

armCircles.name: Arm Circles
armCircles.description: Make small circles with your arms, first forward, then backward. Keep movements slow and controlled.
armCircles.instructions: Start with small circles and gradually increase the radius.

gentleTwist.name: Gentle Twist
gentleTwist.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart, place your hands on your hips, and gently twist from side to side.
gentleTwist.instructions: Keep the movements controlled and breathe evenly.

calfRaises.name: Calf Raises
calfRaises.description: Stand tall and slowly rise up onto your toes, then lower back down. Keep movements controlled.
calfRaises.instructions: Maintain your balance and avoid jerky movements.

deepBreathing.name: Deep Breathing
deepBreathing.description: Take 5 deep breaths, inhaling through your nose and exhaling through your mouth. Feel your body relax.

cactusArms.name: Cactus Arms
cactusArms.description: Sit tall, bring your arms up to shoulder height, bend your elbows to 90 degrees, and press your arms back against your chair.
cactusArms.instructions: Keep your shoulder blades squeezed together.

divers.name: Divers
divers.description: Sit tall, reach your arms forward and up, then dive them down between your legs, rounding your spine.
divers.instructions: Move slowly and controlled through the entire movement.

seatedBackTwist.name: Seated Back Twist
seatedBackTwist.description: Sit tall and gently twist your torso to the right, placing your left hand on your right knee. Hold and repeat on other side.
seatedBackTwist.instructions: Keep your hips straight and twist only your upper body.

shoulderBladeSqueeze.name: Shoulder Blade Squeeze
shoulderBladeSqueeze.description: Squeeze your shoulder blades together, hold for 5 seconds, then release. Keep your shoulders relaxed.
shoulderBladeSqueeze.instructions: Focus on squeezing the shoulder blades together, not lifting the shoulders.

chinTucks.name: Chin Tucks
chinTucks.description: Gently pull your chin back, creating a double chin. Hold for 5 seconds, then release. Repeat slowly.
chinTucks.instructions: Imagine you're making a double chin.

meta.description: A gentle stretching and flexibility app designed for all ages and abilities

editorial.shareMessage: Please share with family, friends and colleagues
